mapper.select: SELECT user_id AS userId, birth_date AS birthDate, phone, address, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM tb_user_profile WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_user_profile (user_id, birth_date, phone, address) VALUES (#{userId}, #{birthDate}, #{phone}, #{address}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE birth_date = VALUES(birth_date), phone = VALUES(phone), address = VALUES(address)
